Posts.Content: So glad it wasn't too bad. When will you get the results?  Report
Posts.Title: Operation

Posts.Content: I am glad you are seeing a doctor. It is most likely nothing but it's good to check. I would cut back on Caffeine because that can cause more breast pain Report
Posts.Title: Occasional inversion/dip in areola? Please help??

Posts.Content: Marie, Please do not worry. It may just be calcification or something benign. Please stop caffeine as it makes your breasts more lumpy and sensitive. Take vitamin E 400-800 IU a day (if you dont have a bleeding problem). Please let me know about the results.  Report
Posts.Title: Very worried
